actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the prorating of veterans compensation and pension for the month in which the death of a veteran occurs.

summary.text: Amends Federal veterans' benefits provisions to provide for the prorating of veterans' disability compensation, dependency and indemnity compensation, or pension benefits for the month in which the death of a veteran occurs.

titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the prorating of veterans compensation and pension for the month in which the death of a veteran occurs.
